reviewContent: Roofers United has been great to work with.
They were nice, but I they're instructions could be clearer
I crashed their drone, luckily they had a backup! Although I could do without the yelling.
Roofers United has been absolutely perfect, great instructions, very professional, and alwasy answered my questions

Jack has been great to work with.
JS Films is great, he's a chill guy with some really cool films and is awesome to work with
This was my first job I DIDN'T crash a drone! They were very complimentary of my piloting skills.
Big Oil is the opitome of 'too big to fail', it feels like working with the DMV, and it seemed like no one knew exactly who was in charge.
